Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Reabsorb \Re`ab*sorb"\ (r[=e]`[a^]b*s[^o]rb"), v. t. To absorb again; to draw in, or imbibe, again what has been effused, extravasated, or thrown off; to swallow up again; as, to reabsorb chyle, lymph, etc.; -- used esp. of fluids. [1913 Webster]
